statements.chinese: 这辆车通过他被清洗了
statements.english: the car is washed by him

statements.chinese: 这辆车（过去）被他清洗了
statements.english: the car was washed by him

statements.chinese: 这辆车昨天被他清洗了
statements.english: the car was washed by him yesterday

statements.chinese: 这个问题被那个学生回答了
statements.english: the question is answered by the student

statements.chinese: 这个问题（过去）被那个学生回答了
statements.english: the question was answered by the student

statements.chinese: 那个问题（过去）被解决了
那个紧急的问题（过去）被解决了
那个紧急的问题（过去）被他们解决了
statements.english: the urgent problem was solved by them

statements.chinese: 这个故事（过去）被我的爷爷讲述
statements.english: the story was told by my grandfather

statements.chinese: 她（过去）被告诉喝更多的水
statements.english: she was told to drink more water
she was told by the doctor

statements.chinese: 她（过去）被医生告诉喝更多的水
statements.english: she was told by the doctor to drink more water
the flowers will be watered by me

statements.chinese: 那个演讲者（过去）被邀请了
那个演讲者（过去）被他们邀请了
statements.english: the speaker was invited by them

statements.chinese: 那个邀请（过去）被接受了
那个邀请（过去）被他们接受了
statements.english: the invitation was accepted by them

statements.chinese: 加入我们团队的那个邀请
statements.english: the invitation to join our team

statements.chinese: 加入我们团队的那个邀请（过去）被接受了
statements.english: the invitation to join our team was accepted

statements.chinese: 加入我们团队的那个邀请（过去）被他们接受了
statements.english: the invitation to join our team was accepted by them

statements.chinese: 那个挑战将会被我们接受
statements.english: the challenge will be accepted by us

statements.chinese: 家庭作业应该被你完成
statements.english: the homework should be finished by you

statements.chinese: 家庭作业应该在晚饭之前被你完成
statements.english: the homework should be finished by you before dinner

statements.chinese: 这顿晚饭是被我妈做的
statements.english: the dinner is cooked by my mother

statements.chinese: 这顿晚饭（过去）是被我妈做的
statements.english: the dinner was cooked by my mother

statements.chinese: 那个窗户被一个石头打破了
statements.english: the window is broken by a stone

statements.chinese: 那个窗户（过去）被一个石头打破了
statements.english: the window was broken by a stone

statements.chinese: 那个窗户将会被我关闭
statements.english: the window will be closed by me

statements.chinese: 这个秘密将会被他保持
statements.english: the secret will be kept by him
the world will be saved by them

statements.chinese: 那场足球比赛将会被举行
statements.english: the football match will be held

statements.chinese: 那场足球比赛明天将会被举行
statements.english: the football match will be held tomorrow
